sumDscr.universe: Age limits: 16-74 years Location: national Name of country: Netherlands

dataColl.datacollector: Nederlands instituut voor de publieke opinie en het marktonderzoek, NIPO * Amsterdam
dataColl.sampProc: multi stage cluster sample: first stage sampling of municipalities / next stage selection of addresses from population register of dwellings / per address a cluster of three other addresses was determined and at these three addresses the respondent was selected Number of unit original/losses: nr. of cases: 1966
dataColl.collSitu: duration of interview / other reasons of no-interview
dataColl.actMin: follow up visits 2, then substitution by next address
